LanguageData.MOT_hygieneIrrigation_desc: Move Dubs Bad Hygiene's Irrigation to the Medieval age.
LanguageData.MOT_hygieneHeating_desc: Move Dubs Bad Hygiene's Central Heating to the Medieval age.
LanguageData.MOT_vfeClassicalIntegrations_desc: Enable use of bronze from VFE Classical, bronze recipe is changed to require Medieval Overhaul Iron
LanguageData.MOT_rimFantasyWork_desc: Work needed to perform a single mining operation.
LanguageData.MOT_rimFantasyProduct_desc: Number of Gemstone resulting from a single mining operation.
LanguageData.MOT_genericPatches_desc: Experimental generic patches to patch more recipes using non-medieval technology.\n\nFor example: Industrial Components becomes Basic Components.
LanguageData.MOT_applyRestart_tooltip: Apply the new settings and restart Rimworld.\n\nWarning: This will restart Rimworld!
